#summary JSON representation of a graph
#labels Phase-Design
= Introduction =

This shall be able to include any DOT representation.

DOT is powerful enough to describe anything we may ever want to represent.
Still we want to attach event handlers to nodes and edges, *should they be part of the graph?*


= Details =
{{{
graph = {
  name,      // string
  label,     // string
  nodes,     // array(node)
  edges,     // array(edge)
  attributes // array(attribute)
};

node: {
  name,      // string
  label,     // string
  attributes // array(attribute)
};

edge: {
  src,       // string
  dst,       // string
  label,     // string
  directed,  // bool
  attributes // array(attribute)
};

attribute: {
  color,
  style,
  pos
};
}}}
